# PKAddPassButtonStyle.blackOutline

**Case**

A black button with a light outline.

## Declaration

```swift
case blackOutline
```

## Discussion

Use this button when displaying this button against a dark background (shown here against a black background). 

## Constants

- **PKAddPassButtonStyle.black**: A black button with white lettering.
